about.description: My name is Derlin R. Valera. I am a Software Engineering student passionate about backend development and software architecture. I work with Java, Spring Boot, and microservices design, with experience in scalable APIs, Spring Cloud, JWT authentication, and PostgreSQL. I have basic knowledge of Docker and deployment. I am seeking entry-level backend roles to continue learning about cloud computing, microservices development, and DevOps.
